thread.title: Some Windows 10 Users Can’t Add Google or Outlook Mail Accounts, Microsoft Offers Fix
thread.title_full: Some Windows 10 Users Can’t Add Google or Outlook Mail Accounts, Microsoft Offers Fix - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Some Windows 10 Users Can’t Add Google or Outlook Mail Accounts, Microsoft Offers Fix
text: Windows 10 comes with a completely overhauled Mail app, but just like many other universal apps included in the new OS, it fails to work properly on some computers and a number of users cannot add their Gmail or Outlook.com accounts. Trying to do it fails with an error that reads “Something went wrong” and a code that could be one of the following (but not limited to these, though): 0x8007042b, 0x80040154, 0x8000ffff, 0x8007000d, 0x80c8043e, 0x80070435, 0x8007006d, and 0x80... »
